Processing Text Files
=====================

This section explains how text processing is done using the various available functions:

- ``count_words()``: Count words in a file.
- ``count_chars()``: Count characters in a file.
- ``count_lines()``: Count lines in a file.
- ``find_word()``: Find a word in the file.
- ``replace_word()``: Replace a word and save the changes to a new file.
